Here is the list of scores for each sign at $LINE, along with a brief description:
1. Aries - 7/10 - Natural-born leaders often struggle to follow rules and may need to work on their impulse control.
2. Taurus - 6/10 - Grounded and practical, but can be stubborn and resistant to change.
3. Gemini - 8/10 - Quick-witted and adaptable, but may struggle with focus and commitment.
4. Cancer - 5/10 - Emotional and empathetic, but can be overly sensitive and indecisive.
5. Leo - 9/10 - Charismatic and confident, but may struggle with humility and self-awareness.
6. Virgo - 8/10 - Analytical and detail-oriented, but can be critical and perfectionistic.
7. Libra - 7/10 - Diplomatic and social, but may struggle with decisiveness and assertiveness.
8. Scorpio - 9/10 - Passionate and intense, but may struggle with emotional regulation and trust issues.
9. Sagittarius - 6/10 - Optimistic and adventurous, but can be reckless and impulsive.
10. Capricorn - 5/10 - Disciplined and responsible, but can be overly critical and pessimistic.
11. Aquarius - 8/10 - Humanitarian and independent, but may struggle with emotional detachment and rebellion.
12. Pisces - 6/10 - Imaginative and compassionate, but can be dreamy and easily distracted.
Note: The scores are subjective and based on general astrological characteristics associated with each sign.
